lines.text: Knowing the captain, I'd look for him in some nice, cool room with a sultry lady.
There are so many sultry ladies in Tesket.
Uh huh. Interesting problem, isn't it?
Your record is an excellent one, except for certain, uh, shall we say, uh, romantic, uh, complications.
My duties have taken me into many strange places.
As my late father would say, all women are unfair.
If they weren't, there'd be no Foreign Legion.
